chunk:
Simple Body Beauty Balm

Brand: Simple Body

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: aqua, cucurbita pepo (PUMPKIN) seed oil, cetearyl olivate, sorbitan olivate, ascorbyl glucoside (VITAMIN C), simmondsia chinensis oil, euphorbia cerifera (CANDELILLA) wax, tocopheryl (VITAMIN E), arginine, stearic acid, dehydroacetic acid, benzyl alcoh

c acid, benzyl alcohol, water, hippophae rhamnoides fruit extract (SEA BUCKTHORN), daucus carota (CARROT) seed essential oil, a proprietary blend of ESSENTIAL OILS

Directions: Dispense a dime-sized amount of our ageless Beauty Balm onto your fingertips. With a gentle, upward motion, massage into face, neck, and décolleté, ensuring even coverage.

ing even coverage.

Warnings: A patch test for skin sensitivity is recommended. Discontinue use if irritation
occurs. If product comes in direct contact with eyes, rinse thoroughly with water. The safety
of this product has not been determined. For external use only.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental
ancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
